Package jchess.common

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IBoard
    IBoard provides abstraction to IBoardData and IBoardAgent.
    IBoardActivity
    This interface ensures the required activity is generated and stored against a move.
    IBoardAgent
    IBoardAgent provides interface for the module where the all the decisions (game) are taken.
    IBoardData
    IBoardData provides interface for the cache module.
    IBoardFactory
    It fulfills functionality of Abstract Factory Pattern for BoardData and BoardAgent.
    IBoardMapping
    This ensures that the class should facilitates Rule logic by making Board layout similar at logic layer.
    ICacheManager
    This interface allows other modules to interact with storage (DB or File).
    IMoveCandidate
    IMoveCandidate
    IPath
    IPath provides abstraction to IPathData and IPathAgent.
    IPathAgent
    IPathAgent provides interface for the module where the all the decisions (game) are taken.
    IPathData
    IPathData provides interface for the cache module.
    IPiece
    IPiece provides abstraction to IPieceData and IPieceAgent.
    IPieceAgent
    IPieceAgent provides interface for the module where the all the decisions (game) are taken.
    IPieceData
    IPieceData provides interface for the cache module.
    IPlayer
    IPlayer provides abstraction to IPlayerData and IPlayerAgent.
    IPlayerAgent
    IPlayerAgent provides interface for the module where the all the decisions (game) are taken.
    IPlayerData
    IPlayerData provides interface for the cache module.
    IPlayerPieceMapping
    This interface ensures that the class must keep information about which pieces are to players and on what positions they have to be placed.
    IPolygon
    IPolygon provides abstraction to polygons.
    IPosition
    IPosition provides abstraction to IPositionData and IPositionAgent.
    IPositionAgent
    IPositionAgent provides interface for the module where the all the decisions (game) are taken.
    IPositionData
    IPositionData provides interface for the cache module.
    IRule
    IRule provides abstraction to IRuleData and IRuleAgent.
    IRuleAgent
    IRuleAgent provides interface for the module where the all the decisions (game) are taken.
    IRuleData
    IRuleData provides interface for the cache module.
    IShape
    IShape provides abstraction to IPolygon and ICircle.
